items.title: BBC witnesses West Bank attack by masked Israeli settlers
items.description: The BBC's Lucy Williamson says the incident near Nablus was "completely unprovoked".

items.title: BBC witnesses Israeli settlers' attack on Palestinian farm in West Bank
items.description: A BBC team was interviewing a Palestinian farmer when masked men charged towards them.

items.title: Hurricane threatens US East Coast with life-threatening waves
items.description: The Category 4 storm threatens to bring life-threatening surf and rip currents to the US East Coast.

items.title: Rescuers in Nigeria search for dozens missing after boat capsizes
items.description: Safety regulations are rarely enforced leading to a large number of accidents on the waterways.

items.title: War-torn Myanmar to hold first general election since 2021 coup
items.description: Critics have denounced the vote as a sham that will be used to entrench the military government's power.
